c:capability.name: Rule
c:capability.c:description: Model of a rule, which is a specific instance of a RuleTemplate with context necessary for evaluation

c:attribute.name: description
c:attribute.description: User provided description of the rule

c:attribute.name: created
c:attribute.description: Timestamp that the rule was created

c:attribute.name: modified
c:attribute.description: Timestamp that the rule was last modified

c:attribute.name: state
c:attribute.description: The current state of the rule

c:attribute.name: template
c:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the template this rule was created from (if a template based rule)

c:attribute.name: context
c:attribute.description: The context for rule evaluation, if no user defined context is required this is may be null or empty

c:method.name: Enable
c:method.description: Enables the rule if it is disabled

c:method.name: Disable
c:method.description: Disables the rule if it is enabled

c:method.name: UpdateContext
c:method.description: Updates the context for the rule

c:method.name: ListHistoryEntries
c:method.description: Returns a list of all the history log entries associated with this rule

c:parameter.name: limit
c:parameter.description: The maximum number of events to return (defaults to 10)

c:parameter.name: token
c:parameter.description: The token from a previous query to use for retrieving the next set of results

c:return.name: nextToken
c:return.description: The token to use for getting the next page, if null there is no next page

c:return.name: results
c:return.description: The entries associated with this rule
